}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device uses two '''Genesys Logic''' GL852 ( / GL852G?) 4-Port USB Hub controllers. The device presents itself as two seperate 05e3:0607 USB hubs to the host system.
"UH-BSC1-GL10-090121" is silkscreened on the board. :"GL852", "MN6AE07G07", "829AA1111" is marked on the '''Genesys Logic''' controllers.
[https://nuxx.net/gallery/v/acquired_stuff/IMG_4224.jpg.html Most excellent photos of the device on nuxx.net] (and [https://nuxx.net/gallery/v/acquired_stuff/IMG_4221.jpg.html?g2_imageViewsIndex=2 a board shot])
[http://www.genesyslogic.com/manage/upfile/11860396491.pdf GL852 datasheet]
The estimated release date is per the above '''Amazon''' info (hopefully it has always been this device..).
The power adapter included with the device is a '''Sunny''' SYS1298-1305-W2 (100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 30VA, 1.0A max. -> 5VDC 2.6A).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
